Translations.Text: Uveshchevaniya prikhodili i k rodu Fir'auna
Oni polnost'yu otrinuli Nashi znameniya, i My podvergli ikh nakazaniyu Velikogo, Moguchego
Chem luchshe drevnikh [nevernykh] nevernyye sredi vas? Razve u vas yest' okhrannaya gramota, zakreplennaya v [prezhnikh] pisaniyakh
Ili, mozhet byt', oni skazhut: "My vse budem pomogat' drug drugu
Povergnuto budet ikh sonmishche, i budut oni obrashcheny vspyat'
Net zhe! Sudnyy chas - naznachennyy im srok, i chas etot samyy uzhasnyy i gor'kiy
Voistinu, greshniki pogibnut i budut v adu
V tot den', kogda ikh litsom vniz povolokut v ad, [im skazhut]: "Vkusite muki adskiye
Voistinu, My sotvorili kazhduyu veshch' po predopredeleniyu
A veleniye Nashe - yedino, slovno mgnoveniye oka
My pogubili [mnogo] takikh, kak vy. No yest' li takoy, kto pomnil by [Koran] kak nastavleniye
I vse, chto oni vershili, v knige [deyaniy]
Voistinu, bogoboyaznennyye budut sredi sadov i ruch'yev
na lozhakh istiny u moguchego vlastelina
